metadata.title: CVE-2024-1549 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: If a website set a large custom cursor, portions of the cursor could haveoverlapped with the permission dialog, potentially resulting in userconfusion and unexpected granted permissions. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 123, Firefox ESR < 115.8, and Thunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
